AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Yusif Ahmed Rufied: defendant charged with unlawfully transporting illegal aliens, claimed to be a driver in training, received $1000 from Codefendant, wore an orange jumpsuit in court, claimed they were going to McAllen, Texas, helped load undocumented aliens into the trailer, slept in the tractor from Midnight to 6:00 a.m.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruce Henderson: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) Agent and witness, testified against Defendant, described terrain and events related to the smuggling case, stated Codefendant's statements about payments, primary agent on the scene, government witness, worked with ICE Agent Joe Silva, testified that Codefendant described the area surrounding Diesel 2000
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Joe Silva: ICE Agent, worked with Bruce Henderson
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Flores: Border Patrol Agent, provided information about undocumented aliens found in a tractor trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Martin Adaboh: Codefendant of Yusif Ahmed Rufied, from Ghana, Africa, lives in Quebec, Montreal, Canada, involved in smuggling aliens, changed mind about speaking with ICE agents, described the area surrounding Diesel 2000, made statements about payments, identified as driver by one material witness, claimed they were going to San Antonio, Texas, met a woman named Claudia at the Monterrey Inn
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Claudia: woman met by Codefendant at the Monterrey Inn, approached Codefendant to smuggle aliens, present during alien loading, may have sat in the bunk of the cab
